title: How to Unsubscribe from Apple Music
description: Learn how to cancel your Apple Music subscription on various devices, including iPhone, iPad, Mac, Windows, Android, Apple TV, and online. Follow these simple steps to manage your subscription and prevent future charges.

steps_1.title: Unsubscribe via iOS Settings
steps_1.description:
* Open the Settings app on your iPhone or iPad.
* Tap on your name at the top of the screen.
* Select "Subscriptions".
* Find "Apple Music" in the list of subscriptions.
* Tap "Cancel Subscription".
* Confirm your choice to cancel.

seo_text: Cancel Apple Music subscription, unsubscribe Apple Music, Apple Music cancellation, how to cancel Apple Music, stop Apple Music subscription, manage Apple Music subscription, Apple Music billing, Apple Music charges, end Apple Music subscription
